problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, BC = N_1, AC = N_2, CD ⊥ AB at point D, set ∠ACD = α, then the value of cosα is ()
raw_answer:
解:在直角△ABC中,AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=√{3^{2}+4^{2}}=5．∵在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,CD⊥AB于D．∴∠ACD=∠B,∴\cosα=\cosB=\frac{BC}{AB}=\frac{4}{5}．
故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了三角函数的求值,正确理解三角函数的性质:三角函数值值的大小是由角的大小确定,是解决本题的关键．
